REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1106 reute r f BC-NVHOMES-<NVH>-SETS-SP 04-13 0037

TEXT.TITLE: NVHOMES <NVH> SETS SPLIT PAYMENT DATE
TEXT.BODY: NVHomes LP said April 30 will be the distribution date for new units as a result of its previously-announced two-for-one split to unitholders of record April 20. Reuter
